title: U.F.O's
creator_credit: Kenneth Knowlton, Lillian Schwartz and Bell Telephone Laboratories
brief_description: An imaginative experiment in film art, using computer graphics and synthesised music. Achieves a stroboscopic effect through motion, rhythm and form. Music by Emmanuel Ghent.
